author: Special Correspondent
text:
A Crafts Mela organised by Poompuhar of The Tamil Nadu Handicrafts Development Corporation Limited has begun at Meenakshi hall, near Lakshmi Mills signal.

A variety of handicrafts from all over the country are on display.

More than 50 artisans are participating in this event.

Narendra Bose, manager, Poompuhar said: “The objective of conducting this exhibition is to enable customers to buy directly from artisans eliminating middlemen. This way the artisans will get to know more about customer preferences.” The exhibition will be on till February 9 between 10 a.m. to 3 p.m.
title: Crafts Mela begins
